
### We have been using these packages:

* holoviz
* holoviews, bokeh
* hvplot
* ipywidgets
* numpy
* pandas
* panel
* plotly
* psycopg2
* pyviz_comms
* requests
* matplotlib
* SQLAlchemy
* Seaborn

### Types of plotting we have learned:

* Line chart
* Bar plot
* Scatter plot
* Heat map
* Mapbox visualization
* Parallel plot
* Dashboard
* Sunburst chart
* Sharpe ratio
* MCsimulation
* Pie chart
